Go there for forced English subs that weren't written by an illiterate monkey on heroine.
wow didnt know this movie is out! thanks a mil...

Wow, thanks!  A: 9.5  V: 10

Yes, great video and audio, but getting the subs to work with my player were a bitch...then I found out that they are so  badly translated that even the English parts are translated wrong--INTO ENGLISH!  Thanks, VixenofVenus for suggesting better subs, even if its too late for me.  GREAT MOVIE, GREAT (TRUE) AND ONGOING STORY.
